rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall designed with large, open doors for wheelchair accessibility. The Brutalist aesthetic is maintained through exposed concrete finishes.
An expansive living area that integrates natural light and maintains open space for movement. Reinforced concrete columns support the split-level design while ensuring a Brutalist look.
A functional dining area adjacent to the kitchen. Exposed concrete walls and angular designs are used.
Open-concept kitchen with accessible countertops and cabinetry designed for wheelchair users, following Brutalist aesthetics.
Compact living and sleeping area for the servant, including a small private bathroom. Designed with Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
